name: Royal Bugs
description:
You have reached the lost Bug Island and you happen across the royal bug family. Capture them and use them against each other, but watch out each one has a puzzle in front of them and you must complete it in order to challenge them. Earn trophies to show your progress and beat The Emperor to overcome the island.

It is not done yet but it does show the main game play and every puzzle is beatable. The battle system doesn't work yet so just press Z to move past it. There will be some bugs so bear with it! Thank you for playing our game.

Controls: Use mouse to press play and then use WASD to move around. When in battle scene with the bug use Z to fight!
